name: Gear Up!
description:
You are the creation of the mad profesor Dr. W,
You want to help Dr. W to make more robots so you are not alone.
Go ahead and find gears as ingredients to make new bots.
 You have 2 powers, one is to dig up dirt using your drill,
and the second one is travel with dr. W's portal.

Btw. Dr. W's full name is Johnny Hamsterman, 
he just like to be called Dr. W

Credits to UndeadKangaru for music 
Discord: UndeadKangaru/Twitch.TV#7844

This game is made in under a day for the 9DGJ-2-2020 hosted by SnowDrama

If you wan't to rate, please rate on the jam page.

https://itch.io/jam/9-day-jam-9-theme-gears/rate/592167
